name: ASDM Consulting
goal:
- Provide support and strategic advice to a wide range of stakeholders (NGOs, professionals, industry, foundations) in the area of European public health, social affairs, medical affairs and research.
- Identify EU legislations or activities that have an impact on our clients' activities, reflect their positions towards EU policy makers and support the implementation of the strategies
- Project management, interim management
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
- EU Health Programme
- Innovative Medicines Intiative
- Horizon 2020
- Pharmaceutical legislation
- European Partnership on Active and Healthy Ageing
- Access to care
- Health inequalities
- Patient safety
- Joint Actions (dementia, chronic diseases)
- Digital agenda
- European Semester
- Social Protection Committee
- European Fund for Strategic Investment
